name: Fruit Rollerup Ball
description:
Using the arrow keys, roll around the small world and add all the fruit to your ball.  If you get stuck by not being able to move or rotate you'll have 3 seconds to make your way out of being stuck before the game ends.  Find the larger fruit for more points and get as high a score as your can!

CONTROLS

Arrows or WAD for movement  (There is no backwards movement)

Spacebar to restart on loss

Highly inspired by Katamari Damacy.
